summary.para: Returns a value representing the sign of each element of InputTensor, placing the result into the corresponding element of OutputTensor.
summary.code: f(x) = -1, if x < 0 1, if x > 0 0, otherwise // This includes negative zero.
summary.para: This operator supports in-place execution, meaning that OutputTensor is permitted to alias InputTensor during binding.
The input tensor to read from.
The output tensor to write the results to.
